content:
=== NEWS ARTICLE ===
Title: Zepto files for $1.3 billion IPO confidentially
Source: Economic Times - Markets
Published: 2025-12-28 04:02
Related Stocks: General Market News
Categories: markets

Summary:
Quick commerce platform Zepto has filed confidential draft papers with SEBI for a $1.3 billion IPO, aiming to raise Rs 11,000 crore in fresh capital. The company, valued at $7 billion, is set to be the youngest venture capital-backed firm to go public, with a potential listing in July-September 2026.

Sentiment: neutral
URL: https://economictimes.indiatimes.com/markets/ipos/fpos/zepto-files-for-1-3-billion-ipo-confidentially/articleshow/126211860.cms
